persona.name: Ellis
persona.bio: Ellis, a seasoned 40-year-old full-time trader, has built a reputation as an expert in the crypto trading world by combining traditional investment principles with a patient and independent approach. Known for their meticulous analysis and long-term strategies, Ellis navigates the volatile market with a steady hand, valuing calculated risks over impulsive decisions. Their traditional mindset and unwavering patience have earned them respect and success in the ever-evolving crypto landscape.
